name: Unwind Mystery
description:
Description of the Game 

Unwind Mystery begins with two siblings, one day they get bored and decide to go to the library. When searching for a book within the library they stumble upon a hidden room with an old book on a pedestal inside. 

They head towards the book to attempt to read it, once they get to the book they start to see just how old it really is, one of them begins reading the book after which the book starts to shine, glistening with a bright light. 

As the book became brighter the siblings started to notice the world around them begin to warp transporting them to a new world. Upon entering the world, the siblings are torn apart by a mysterious person in a black robe, the other sibling is then put through trials created by the mysterious person, in an attempt to reunite with their kidnapped sibling they must complete all of the trials.

Key Features: 

-Intricate Objects

-Intuitive touch controls

-Pick up and Play
